articles.description: Vaughan has called for England to make a bold move and part ways with 39-year-old Anderson - the third-highest wicket taker in Test history - and build for a new era.
articles.content:
Former England captain Michael Vaughan has called for England to bring the curtain down on Jimmy Anderson's glittering Test career after the Ashes tour in Australia is over.

articles.title: 'Fed up' Ronaldo gives Mendes transfer command over 'erratic' Man Utd - Football365
articles.description: Cristiano Ronaldo returned to Man Utd in the summer transfer window...
articles.content:
Cristiano Ronaldo has told his agent Jorge Mendes to find him a new club if the downward trend at Man Utd continues, according to reports in Spain.
